entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Chatham-Kent
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:22 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, -0.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chatham-Kent 11:49 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
Condition: Mist
Temperature: -0.5°C
Pressure: 101.1 kPa
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 100 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -0.5°C
Wind: SE 24 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of drizzle or freezing drizzle. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle changing to periods of drizzle and ending late this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind southeast 30 km/h becoming west 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Cloudy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy this evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
